extendedInfo.description: This free devotional for Christian women contains a variety of articles to help you grow in your relationship with God.  From Christian poems to thought-provoking articles on things related to Christian womanhood, this daily devotional app can offer regular encouragement to truly live for God.The articles available through this Christian woman devotional app are authored by a variety of Christian ladies who offer some some wise and practical insights about loving and serving God in our day and time.
